fields.label: Select Hero Banner Style
fields.name: hero_banner_style
fields.instructions:
Banner Style 1: Use this style to make all the content align center
Banner Style 2: Use this style to make all the content align right
Single Background image: Non parallax effect
Single Background Image: Use this style for Parallax effect

choices.style1: Slider Style 1 - Use this style to make all the content align center
choices.style2: Slider Style 2 - Use this style to make all the content align right
choices.style3: Single Background image - Non parallax effect

sub_fields.label: Slider Image (Desktop)
sub_fields.name: banner_image
sub_fields.instructions: This field for admin can setup image of banner slider on desktop and mobile (if mobile image field haven't setup).

sub_fields.label: Slider Image (Mobile)
sub_fields.name: slider_image_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: This field for admin can setup image of banner slider on mobile

sub_fields.label: Slider Heading
sub_fields.name: banner_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Please use Heading 2 for title and Paragraph for description

sub_fields.label: Slider Button URL
sub_fields.name: banner_link
sub_fields.instructions: For this field we can leave this if admin don't need add link to banner

sub_fields.label: Slider Heading
sub_fields.name: banner_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Please use Heading 2 for title and Paragraph for description

sub_fields.label: Slider Button URL
sub_fields.name: banner_link
sub_fields.instructions: For this field we can leave this if admin don't need add link to banner

fields.label: Service icon before title
fields.name: service_icon_before_title
fields.instructions: Leave this field if use default icon for this.

sub_fields.label: Service Box Image
sub_fields.name: services_item_image
sub_fields.instructions: Note: Please use image with size 750*970px for this field

sub_fields.label: Service Page URL - Open in a new tab

fields.name: explore_our_treatments_button_link
fields.instructions: Paste '#section-contact_us' in the field to make the page scroll down to bottom contact form on click

fields.label: About Us - Learn More button Link
fields.name: about_us_learn_more_link

fields.label: Testimonials styles
fields.name: testimonials_style
fields.instructions:
Testimonial Style 1: Use this style for non-background image
Testimonial Style 2: Use this style to add background image

fields.label: In the press logos

fields.button_label: Add new In the press logo

fields.label: Book your appointment mobile image
fields.name: book_appointment_image_mobile
fields.instructions: This image show on mobile only. Leave this field if you don't need different image for mobile

fields.label: Book appointment button link
fields.name: book_appointment_button_link
fields.instructions: Paste '#section-contact_us' without quotes in the below field to make the page scroll down to bottom contact form on click

fields.label: Select Blog Posts
fields.name: select_blog_posts
fields.instructions: Click on the select field to select and add blog posts

fields.name: instagram_account_name

fields.label: Contact Us Styles
fields.name: contact_us_style
fields.instructions:
Contact Us Style 1: Use this style No background / Background in whole section
Contact Us Style 2: Background in just gravity form box
Contact Us Style 3: Form and image side by side
